description:
Rigging a tarp. Hanging your food away from critters. Securing your canoe to the shore. Knots are essential to outdoor life. This compact and weatherproof guide walks you step-by-step through the most useful knots, hitches, splices and lashings. It includes multiple variations and instructions for both right and left handers, and a carabiner and 2 pieces of rope to practice with.

  • Waterproof instruction booklet
name: Outdoor Knots Kit
